tool_description: Unleash the power of math and intrigue your users with a treasure captivating facts about numbers, intelligently organized.
name: Numberfacts
title: Numberfacts

api_list.name: numberfacts
api_list.description: Gives a random number interesting facts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://numberfacts.p.rapidapi.com/get_random_fact"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "numberfacts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://numberfacts.p.rapidapi.com/get_random_fact"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "numberfacts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
